  • Stats
Log inSign up

Make Music Matter

Join a revolution to reinvent the way you listen to music and engage with artists, through authentic communities.

La Femme
Leila
Leila
La Femme

Stream & support your favorite artists

Try out a new way to experience and discover music! Whether you're in the mood for classical pieces or modern groovy hits, Pianity has something for everyone, for free, forever.

Start Streaming

Enjoy more than music

Buying music on Pianity is the key to access exclusive perks. Enjoy things like backstage access to shows, invite to recording sessions, vinyls and more...

Browse Perks

Engage with artists in a more exclusive way

Owning songs can also give you access to Clubs! Theyâ€™ve been designed to allow fans to gather in a community space where they can be part of their favorite artistâ€™s creative process, learn more about him and connect with fellow music fans...

Discover Clubs

Own Rare musical gems

Just like vinyls, songs on Pianity are released in limited editions. These editions are available in 4 levels of increasing Scarcity. Each scarcity comes with its own set of perks. The rarer the song, the more valuable it is!

Unique

1 edition

Legendary

10 editions

Epic

100 editions

Rare

1000 editions
Sign up

Share the success of up and coming artists!

Due to their rare nature, the value of your Pianity songs can increase over time, in correlation to the artistâ€™s popularity. Imagine if you had supported the creation of the first vinyl of the Rolling Stones ðŸ˜‰

Discover new talents

Join a platform ruled by its community

Playlists

Showcase your music curation skills by creating your very own public playlists

$PIA

Become a Pianity shareholder through $PIA, our token. Earn it by collecting songs and contributing to the community

DAO

Get involved in the evolution of Pianity and help us shape the future of music

Bring Pianity anywhere you go

The future of music right at your fingertips

FAQ

What is Pianity all about, and how is it going to change my music experience?

Pianity is more than a music platformâ€”it's a revolution. We're giving you the power to interact with music like never before. Ever wished you could own a piece of your favorite song, or directly support an artist you believe in? Now you can. On Pianity, music isn't just listened toâ€”it's lived. You get to vote on songs, own unique pieces of music, and be part of a community that champions artists. It's more than just changing your music experienceâ€”it's about making your love for music truly matter.

What makes Pianity stand out from other music platforms?

Unlike traditional music platforms, Pianity offers an unprecedented level of interaction between artists and their fans. Here, you can vote for your favorite songs to turn them into unique digital assets, engage directly with artists and other music enthusiasts in our Clubs, and earn $PIA tokens that you can use for various purposes on the platform. It's a dynamic and vibrant music community where you can have a real impact.

I've heard of 'Scarcity Levels'. What do they mean for my music collection's value?

Scarcity Levels are what makes your music collection on Pianity truly unique. They denote how many copies of a particular music NFT exist. From "Unique" (1 piece) to "Legendary" (10 pieces), "Epic" (100 pieces), and "Rare" (1,000 pieces), owning a music NFT of a lower Scarcity Level means you have a truly special piece in your collection, potentially increasing its value.

What are these $PIA tokens, and how do I earn and use them?

$PIA tokens are the lifeblood of the Pianity ecosystem. They're a way for you to earn rewards for your activity and engagement on the platform. These tokens can unlock exclusive experiences on Pianity, enabling you to deepen your connection with the music you love. Learn more about $PIA

What's a 'Bounty' and how do I claim one?

Picture a 'Bounty' as a special vinyl record your favorite artist tosses from the stage, directly into the fan crowdâ€”it's an exclusive gift from them to you. To claim a Bounty on Pianity, you've got to be on your toes, just like at a concert. Bounties are freebies offered by musicians and they're claimed on a first-come, first-served basis. Keep an eye on artist announcements, stay active, and when a Bounty drops, be quick to claim it! Learn more about Bounties

Tell me about the 'Clubs' on Pianity. How can they bring me closer to my favorite artists?

Clubs are exclusive spaces on Pianity where artists and fans can connect more intimately. In these Clubs, you get access to exclusive content, direct interactions with artists, and the ability to engage with a community of fellow music enthusiasts. It's like a VIP pass to your favorite artist's backstage! Learn more about Clubs

What are these Leaderboards I've heard about, and how can I climb to the top?

Leaderboards are Pianity's way of celebrating its most active and engaged users! By participating in different activities like voting, collecting, and more, you earn points and rise up the Leaderboards. Top users get rewarded with $PIA tokens every week, so it's worth staying engaged! Learn more about Leaderboards

What's the scoop on these Weekly Rewards, and how can I boost my earnings?

Weekly Rewards are a way for us to thank you for being part of the Pianity community. Stay active, engage with the platform, and you could earn $PIA tokens as part of these rewards. The more you participate, the more you can earn! Learn more about Weekly Rewards

How do payments work on Pianity? Can I use my credit card or crypto, and what about gas fees?

When it comes to payments, we're all about flexibility and ease. Feel free to use your credit card or your favorite cryptocurrency - whatever strikes the right chord with you. And gas fees? Let's just say we're not fans. We're here to build a community that values music, not one burdened by extra fees. So, we pick up the tab for those. Enjoy the music, support the artists, and leave the gas fees to us.

Are you a record label?Register your artists and manage your releasesApplyâ†’
Are you an artist?Publish your songs and grow your fanbaseRegisterâ†’

Pianity is a music NFT platform where musicians and their community gather to create, share, trade and collect limited-edition songs.

Follow us

Join us

    • Start your music collection
    • Start releasing music with us

About Pianity

    • About us
    • Our artists
    • Press
    • Careers

Resources

    • Blog
    • Helpdesk
    • Terms of Service

Language

Currency

Install it and then refresh the page."}}},"page":{"captcha":"This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the Google <1>Privacy Policy and <3>Terms of Service apply.","metadata":{"description":"Sign up or log in to discover new music and build your collection.","title":"Create or log into an account"},"subtitle":"Register to discover new music and start collecting","subtitle_artist":"Start publishing on Pianity!","subtitle_last":"Choose a username that sets yourself apart!","subtitle_loading":"This should only take a few seconds","subtitle_login":"Log in to discover new songs and grow your collection","title":"Welcome!","title_last":"One last step!","title_loading":"Connecting","title_login":"Welcome back!"}}},"faq":{"faq":{"paragraph":{"1":"Pianity is more than a music platformâ€”it's a revolution. We're giving you the power to interact with music like never before. Ever wished you could own a piece of your favorite song, or directly support an artist you believe in? Now you can. On Pianity, music isn't just listened toâ€”it's lived. You get to vote on songs, own unique pieces of music, and be part of a community that champions artists. It's more than just changing your music experienceâ€”it's about making your love for music truly matter.","2":"Unlike traditional music platforms, Pianity offers an unprecedented level of interaction between artists and their fans. Here, you can vote for your favorite songs to turn them into unique digital assets, engage directly with artists and other music enthusiasts in our Clubs, and earn $PIA tokens that you can use for various purposes on the platform. It's a dynamic and vibrant music community where you can have a real impact.","3":"Toplist at Pianity is where you as a music fan can directly influence the music world! By voting for your favorite songs, you help them climb up the Toplist. The top-ranked songs get turned into unique digital assets that you can own. Plus, when a song you voted for becomes an NFT, you earn $PIA tokens. It's a fun, interactive way to support your favorite music and earn rewards. Learn more about the Toplist","4":"Scarcity Levels are what makes your music collection on Pianity truly unique. They denote how many copies of a particular music NFT exist. From "Unique" (1 piece) to "Legendary" (10 pieces), "Epic" (100 pieces), and "Rare" (1,000 pieces), owning a music NFT of a lower Scarcity Level means you have a truly special piece in your collection, potentially increasing its value.","5":"$PIA tokens are the lifeblood of the Pianity ecosystem. They're a way for you to earn rewards for your activity and engagement on the platform. These tokens can unlock exclusive experiences on Pianity, enabling you to deepen your connection with the music you love. Learn more about $PIA","6":"Picture a 'Bounty' as a special vinyl record your favorite artist tosses from the stage, directly into the fan crowdâ€”it's an exclusive gift from them to you. To claim a Bounty on Pianity, you've got to be on your toes, just like at a concert. Bounties are freebies offered by musicians and they're claimed on a first-come, first-served basis. Keep an eye on artist announcements, stay active, and when a Bounty drops, be quick to claim it! Learn more about Bounties","7":"Clubs are exclusive spaces on Pianity where artists and fans can connect more intimately. In these Clubs, you get access to exclusive content, direct interactions with artists, and the ability to engage with a community of fellow music enthusiasts. It's like a VIP pass to your favorite artist's backstage! Learn more about Clubs","8":"Leaderboards are Pianity's way of celebrating its most active and engaged users! By participating in different activities like voting, collecting, and more, you earn points and rise up the Leaderboards. Top users get rewarded with $PIA tokens every week, so it's worth staying engaged! Learn more about Leaderboards","9":"Weekly Rewards are a way for us to thank you for being part of the Pianity community. Stay active, engage with the platform, and you could earn $PIA tokens as part of these rewards. The more you participate, the more you can earn! Learn more about Weekly Rewards","10":"When it comes to payments, we're all about flexibility and ease. Feel free to use your credit card or your favorite cryptocurrency - whatever strikes the right chord with you. And gas fees? Let's just say we're not fans. We're here to build a community that values music, not one burdened by extra fees. So, we pick up the tab for those. Enjoy the music, support the artists, and leave the gas fees to us.","11":"Yes, Pianity takes a commission on sales on both the primary and secondary market, you can learn more about our Public revenue split and our Profit sharing program"},"title":{"1":"What is Pianity all about, and how is it going to change my music experience?","2":"What makes Pianity stand out from other music platforms?","3":"What's this 'Toplist' everyone's buzzing about, and how can I join in?","4":"I've heard of 'Scarcity Levels'. What do they mean for my music collection's value?","5":"What are these $PIA tokens, and how do I earn and use them?","6":"What's a 'Bounty' and how do I claim one?","7":"Tell me about the 'Clubs' on Pianity. How can they bring me closer to my favorite artists?","8":"What are these Leaderboards I've heard about, and how can I climb to the top?","9":"What's the scoop on these Weekly Rewards, and how can I boost my earnings?","10":"How do payments work on Pianity? Can I use my credit card or crypto, and what about gas fees?","11":"Does Pianity take a commission on song sales?"}}},"homepage":{"homepage":{"app":{"h2":"Bring Pianity anywhere you go","paragraph":"The future of music right at your fingertips"},"clubs":{"cta":"Discover Clubs","h2":"Engage with artists in a more exclusive way","paragraph":"Owning songs can also give you access to Clubs! Theyâ€™ve been designed to allow fans to gather in a community space where they can be part of their favorite artistâ€™s creative process, learn more about him and connect with fellow music fans..."},"community":{"dao":{"paragraph":"Get involved in the evolution of Pianity and help us shape the future of music"},"h2":"Join a platform ruled by its community","pia":{"paragraph":"Become a Pianity shareholder through $PIA, our token. Earn it by collecting songs and contributing to the community"},"toplist":{"paragraph":"Showcase your music curation skills by creating your very own public playlists"}},"hero":{"h1":"Make Music Matter","subtitle":"Join a revolution to reinvent the way you listen to music and engage with artists, through authentic communities."},"latest":{"cta":{"listen":"Listen Now"},"h2":"Hottest Releases"},"perks":{"cta":"Browse Perks","h2":"Enjoy more than music","paragraph":"Buying music on Pianity is the key to access exclusive perks. These editions are available in 4 levels of increasing Scarcity. Each scarcity comes with its own set of perks. The rarer the song, the more valuable it is!","rare":{"edition":"1000 editions","title":"Rare"},"unique":{"edition":"1 edition","title":"Unique"}},"stream":{"cta":"Start Streaming","h2":"Stream & support your favorite artists","paragraph":"Try out a new way to experience and discover music! Whether you're in the mood for classical pieces or modern groovy hits, Pianity has something for everyone, for free, forever."},"succes":{"cta":"Discover new talents","h2":"Share the success of up and coming artists!","paragraph":"Due to their rare nature, the value of your Pianity songs can increase over time, in correlation to the artistâ€™s popularity.
